briefdescription.para: Round n up to a multiple of a (a must be power of two).
Allocate a 64-byte aligned buffer with C11 aligned_alloc rules.

detaileddescription.para: aligned_alloc requires size to be a multiple of alignment; this helper rounds up accordingly on non-MSVC toolchains.

simplesect.para: Pointer to aligned allocation, or NULL on failure.

briefdescription.para: Free a buffer allocated by ie_aligned_malloc_64.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const float *x, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_f32_avx2_impl

briefdescription.para: AVX2/FMA GEMV (fp32), blocked-K aware, optional bias epilogue.

detaileddescription.para: Streams each row of W linearly and performs a dot product with x using AVX2 FMAs. Supports optional blocked-K traversal via blk_k.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *W, const int8_t *x_q, float *y, size_t rows, size_t cols, const float *bias, size_t blk_k, ie_act_i8_params params, int symmetric)
memberdef.name: ie_gemv_qi8_f32_avx2_impl

briefdescription.para: AVX2/FMA GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations (dequant + fp32 GEMV).

detaileddescription.para: AVX2/FMA GEMV with per-tensor INT8 activations, provided by gemv_avx2.c.
Dequantizes x_q into a temporary 64-byte aligned float buffer, then calls ie_gemv_f32_avx2_impl. The temp buffer is freed before returning.
